pullRequest.title: Small bug fixing
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description

Fixed Magic Sugar not able to be placed on Ancient Altars, and fixed Debug Fish on heads placed on walls.
Changes

Added an id check to MagicSugar.java and added a check if the head is a wall head and if so use Directional instead of Rotatable for DebugFishListener.java
Related Issues


Resolves #1379
Resolves #1212
Testability


 I have fully tested the proposed changes and promise that they will not break everything into chaos.
 I have also tested the proposed changes in combination with various popular addons and can confirm my changes do not break them.

commit.message: Fixed DebugFishListener casting BlockData of wall skulls to Rotatable instead of Directional.
Allowed MagicSugar to be placed on Altars.
Null checking is a good idea.

nodes.bodyText:
This should return true.
True means "Yes this Item was me".
With false you are telling Slimefun to keep looking for items that match...

I am also thinking whether a Material comparison for ENCHANTMENT_TABLE and DISPENSER may not be a better idea.
It would definitely be better performance-wise.
Also please add a comment to this code to explain why it is there.

commit.message: Added comments, switched return for MagicSugar, and made MagicSugar ancient altar check pass on any dispensers/enchantment tables.
